function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Promoting hybrid work models and flexible workspace solutions","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct thorough headcounts analysis to inform restructuring plans and prioritize measures that enable physical distancing and personal protection.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invest in home office setup support, provide guidelines for safe home work environments, and monitor the impact of wfh on contagion rates.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct a thorough analysis of organizational needs and design office spaces that support effective distancing and hygiene practices.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementation of effective workplace modification strategies for pandemic control","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing effective workplace modification plans and strategic alignment to minimize the risk of contagious disease spread. establishing clear policies for health and safety protocols.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensuring strategic alignment between business strategies and workplace modification plans. regular review and update of workplace modification plans to align with changing business scenarios.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Establishing clear guidelines and standards for workplace modification activities. providing training and resources for consistent implementation across all departments and locations.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement remote work strategies and flexible workplace modification plans","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement pandemic-proof office design and address social distancing measures","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further research and studies to fully understand the influence of occupant behavior on air change rates.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop and implement ventilation systems and air filtration technologies to maintain indoor air quality.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Account for occupant window-opening behavior in predicting residential exposures","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Educating occupants about the impact of window-opening behavior on indoor air quality, promoting alternative ventilation methods","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Include window-opening behavior as a variable in air change rate studies, control for window-opening behavior in data analysis","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Installation of a ventilation system to introduce fresh air into the home","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limit unnecessary opening of windows and doors, use air purifiers indoors","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of advanced environmental monitoring equipment, conduct thorough data collection during experiments","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Install additional wind sensors at different heights around the house, analyze wind patterns from multiple locations","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of hvac system, use of hepa filters","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Installation of mechanical ventilation systems, regular monitoring of indoor air quality","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular hvac maintenance, insulation upgrades, use of zoning systems","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement mechanical ventilation systems or increase natural ventilation through windows and doors","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Calibrate temperature monitors regularly and cross-validate with standard instruments","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Install wind sensors or anemometers to measure outdoor wind speed","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement proper ventilation and safety measures","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict protocols for equipment cleaning and sample collection","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multiple measurement techniques and validation with tracer gas methods","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular monitoring of ventilation systems, and adjusting airflow rates as per ventilation guidelines","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular calibration of sf6 monitors, and subtraction of appropriate background levels from all readings","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multiple measurement techniques, and verification of results through independent control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of computational fluid dynamics cfd modeling and airflow analysis to optimize ventilation and airflow patterns","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilize weather forecasting data to adjust ventilation systems in advance","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct thorough ventilation analysis to understand the impact of window opening width and location on air change rate.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting more comprehensive and controlled experiments to account for all variables and conditions.","category":"Environmental parameters and minimize the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"}]}
